Reviews.Title: Very nice and working great
Reviews.Author: michael Soenksen
Reviews.Content: On a scale from 1-10 this would be a 9.9 with the .1 only being a being that it was said to have 16GB of storage and on had 1GB (maybe a typo) BUT other than that this is an excellent phone and the seller is great. :-)

Reviews.Title: Says no SIM card
Reviews.Author: atul singh
Reviews.Content: This is my second htc one x. First one I gave it to my son works great. But with this order I placed with BREED  the phone says no SIM card. Tried different sims but no luck.  I was advised by BREED that it need sim with data plan to startup the phone, tried that too, still says no SIM card. It's just a rip off, I am very unhappy with them, will be talking to amazon to verify their sub standard products maybe the phone  was refurbished.I hope rest of u guys be careful  when u order stuff with BREED.

Reviews.Title: the best htc phone
Reviews.Author: simplycq
Reviews.Content: I love my phone. It is very beautiful and fast. Taking pictures and listening to music is always fun. It carries alot of memory for my pictures and music. Pairing with my other htc phone was easy.
